# Data Analysis: Lucas Leiva's Height Compared to LFC and MCFC Squad
Lucas Leiva played as a center half in the 2016 Capitol One Cup final. How does 
his height compare to the rest of the players?

Load packages:
```{r message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

Read in the player height data from this [Guardian article](http://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/news/tall-short-it-how-premier-4503094). The direct link to the dataset is bananas long so I didn't bother echoing 
that part of the code here. You'll find the link at the bottom of the article. 
I assigned it to variable u:

```{r echo = FALSE}
  u <- "data:application/octet-stream;charset=utf-8,Player%2CClub%2CHeight%20(m)%0AFraser%20Forster%2CSouthampton%2C2.01%0APeter%20Crouch%2CStoke%2C2.01%0APer%20Mertesacker%2CArsenal%2C1.98%0AAsmir%20Begovic%2CStoke%2C1.98%0AJoe%20Hart%2CManchester%20City%2C1.96%0APetr%20Cech%2CChelsea%2C1.96%0AWojciech%20Szczesny%2CArsenal%2C1.96%0AJonas%20Olsson%2CWest%20Brom%2C1.95%0ABrede%20Hangeland%2CCrystal%20Palace%2C1.95%0AFederico%20Fazio%2CTottenham%2C1.95%0AChris%20Smalling%2CManchester%20United%2C1.94%0AMarouane%20Fellaini%2CManchester%20United%2C1.94%0ANemanja%20Matic%2CChelsea%2C1.94%0ABrad%20Guzan%2CAston%20Villa%2C1.93%0AGraziano%20Pelle%2CSouthampton%2C1.93%0ASimon%20Mignolet%2CLiverpool%2C1.93%0ASylvain%20Distin%2CEverton%2C1.93%0AGary%20Cahill%2CChelsea%2C1.93%0AEdin%20Dzeko%2CManchester%20City%2C1.93%0AFlorin%20Gardos%2CSouthampton%2C1.93%0AJason%20Shackell%2CBurnley%2C1.93%0AGeorgios%20Samaras%2CWest%20Brom%2C1.93%0ABen%20Foster%2CWest%20Brom%2C1.93%0AAlex%20McCarthy%2CQPR%2C1.93%0AOlivier%20Giroud%2CArsenal%2C1.92%0AMarko%20Arnautovic%2CStoke%2C1.92%0ADavid%20de%20Gea%2CManchester%20United%2C1.92%0ABoaz%20Myhill%2CWest%20Brom%2C1.91%0AConnor%20Wickham%2CSunderland%2C1.91%0ADamien%20Delaney%2CCrystal%20Palace%2C1.91%0AMichael%20Williamson%2CNewcastle%2C1.91%0ACarlton%20Cole%2CWest%20Ham%2C1.91%0AGeoff%20Cameron%2CStoke%2C1.91%0ASantiago%20Vergini%2CSunderland%2C1.91%0AEmmanuel%20Adebayor%2CTottenham%2C1.91%0AMartin%20Skrtel%2CLiverpool%2C1.91%0AChris%20Wood%2CLeicester%2C1.91%0AMartin%20Kelly%2CCrystal%20Palace%2C1.91%0ASteven%20Caulker%2CQPR%2C1.91%0ARyan%20Shawcross%2CStoke%2C1.91%0AJohn%20O'Shea%2CSunderland%2C1.91%0AJames%20Tomkins%2CWest%20Ham%2C1.91%0AYaya%20Sanogo%2CArsenal%2C1.91%0ARomelu%20Lukaku%2CEverton%2C1.9%0AJoleon%20Lescott%2CWest%20Brom%2C1.9%0AWinston%20Reid%2CWest%20Ham%2C1.9%0AVincent%20Kompany%2CManchester%20City%2C1.9%0APhilippe%20Senderos%2CAston%20Villa%2C1.9%0ALukasz%20Fabianski%2CSwansea%2C1.9%0AFederico%20Fernandez%2CSwansea%2C1.9%0AChristia ```{r}
setwd("/Users/ryanestrellado/Documents/github/epl_player_height")

if (file.exists("data-jX2NV.csv") == FALSE) {
  download.file(u, destfile = "data-jX2NV.csv")
}

# Read dataset
df <- read.csv("data-jX2NV.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

Clean the dataset and subset for just the LFC and MUFC squads. Add a logical 
value for Lucas:

```{r}
# Rename columns and subset data
df2 <- df %>%
  rename("Height" = Height..m.) %>%
  arrange(desc(Height)) %>%
  filter(Club == "Liverpool" | Club == "Manchester City") %>%
  mutate(Lucas = Player == "Lucas Leiva")
```

This is the plot:

### How Tall is Lucas?
Lucas ranks 25th out of 42 players on the Liverpool and Manchester City squads of the 2014-2015 season.  
data: [http://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/news/tall-short-it-how-premier-4503094](http://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/news/tall-short-it-how-premier-4503094)

```{r fig.height = 6, fig.width = 6}
# Plot
ggplot(df2, aes(x = Height, y = reorder(Player, Height), color = Lucas)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("grey", "hotpink3")) +
  guides(color = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Height (Meters)", y = "")
```
